text:
The ₹2.5cr mistake HNIs make?

Panic selling in corrections. 2008 sellers missed 380% gains.

💡 Tax-loss harvesting > emotional exits
📈 Current correction = rebalancing opportunity  
🎯 Contrarian positioning for patient capital

Portfolio philosophy determines legacy. Discuss strategic positioning.

Building Wealth, Creating Trust
ARN: ARN-125847
